description: SRD 5.1 Monsters for D&D 5e Encounter Generator

monsters.name: Aboleth
monsters.tactics: Uses Enslave from distance, then attacks with tentacles. Retreats to water if threatened.

monsters.name: Acolyte
monsters.tactics: Supports allies with healing, uses Sacred Flame at range.

monsters.name: Adult Black Dragon
monsters.tactics: Opens with breath weapon, uses flight to stay mobile, targets weakest party members.

monsters.name: Adult Blue Dragon
monsters.tactics: Burrows to ambush, uses breath weapon in lines, employs Frightful Presence.

monsters.name: Adult Green Dragon
monsters.tactics: Prefers manipulation over combat, uses breath weapon from cover, targets spellcasters.

monsters.name: Adult Red Dragon
monsters.tactics: Aggressive and proud, opens with breath weapon, uses legendary actions liberally.

monsters.name: Adult White Dragon
monsters.tactics: Straightforward attacker, uses breath weapon and claws, retreats to lair if wounded.

monsters.name: Air Elemental
monsters.tactics: Uses Whirlwind to scatter party, attacks prone targets, stays mobile.

monsters.name: Ancient Black Dragon
monsters.tactics: Cunning and patient, uses lair actions, breath weapon, and legendary actions strategically.

monsters.name: Ancient Blue Dragon
monsters.tactics: Master tactician, uses terrain and minions, saves breath weapon for grouped enemies.

monsters.name: Ancient Green Dragon
monsters.tactics: Prefers to corrupt rather than kill, uses minions and traps, breath weapon in confined spaces.

monsters.name: Ancient Red Dragon
monsters.tactics: Supremely confident, devastating breath weapon, uses all legendary actions every round.

monsters.name: Ancient White Dragon
monsters.tactics: Bestial and relentless, uses cold breath repeatedly, targets one enemy until dead.

monsters.name: Androsphinx
monsters.tactics: Tests worthiness with riddles first, uses roar abilities to weaken, then melee.

monsters.name: Animated Armor
monsters.tactics: Follows simple commands, attacks nearest enemy, fights until destroyed.

monsters.name: Ankheg
monsters.tactics: Burrows to ambush, grapples and drags prey underground, uses acid spray when surrounded.

monsters.name: Ape
monsters.tactics: Throws rocks from distance, uses multiattack in melee, flees when bloodied.

monsters.name: Archmage
monsters.tactics: Opens with Time Stop if possible, uses control spells, teleports to safety if threatened.

monsters.name: Assassin
monsters.tactics: Strikes from surprise for Assassinate, uses poison, flees if discovered.

monsters.name: Awakened Shrub
monsters.tactics: Hides among normal plants, attacks when prey is close, flees easily.

monsters.name: Awakened Tree
monsters.tactics: Stands still until enemies approach, uses slam attacks, guards an area.

monsters.name: Axe Beak
monsters.tactics: Charges with beak attack, fights in packs, flees when alone.

monsters.name: Azer
monsters.tactics: Uses heated body in grapples, attacks with warhammer, works with other azers.

monsters.name: Baboon
monsters.tactics: Attacks in groups, uses Pack Tactics, flees when outnumbered.

monsters.name: Badger
monsters.tactics: Burrows to escape, only fights if cornered.

monsters.name: Balor
monsters.tactics: Teleports into melee, uses whip to pull casters close, Death Throes makes it dangerous to kill.

monsters.name: Bandit
monsters.tactics: Attacks in groups, uses light crossbow at range, surrenders when losing badly.

monsters.name: Bandit Captain
monsters.tactics: Commands bandits, uses multiattack, uses reaction to parry, bargains if losing.

monsters.name: Barbed Devil
monsters.tactics: Uses barbed hide in grapples, throws flames at range, fights defensively.

monsters.name: Basilisk
monsters.tactics: Uses petrifying gaze, attacks petrified creatures, guards territory.

monsters.name: Bat
monsters.tactics: Swarms in groups, uses echolocation, flees from light.

monsters.name: Bearded Devil
monsters.tactics: Aggressive melee combatant, uses beard to wound and infest, fights to the death.

monsters.name: Behir
monsters.tactics: Constricts and swallows Medium creatures, uses lightning breath on groups, climbs walls.

monsters.name: Berserker
monsters.tactics: Reckless attacks always, fights until dead, ignores tactics for pure aggression.

monsters.name: Black Bear
monsters.tactics: Multiattack with bite and claws, defends cubs fiercely, otherwise avoids combat.

monsters.name: Black Dragon Wyrmling
monsters.tactics: Ambushes from water, uses breath weapon, flees to mother if badly hurt.

monsters.name: Black Pudding
monsters.tactics: Splits when hit with slashing/lightning, dissolves metal and wood, mindless pursuit.

monsters.name: Blink Dog
monsters.tactics: Teleports to flank, uses pack tactics, retreats by blinking away.

monsters.name: Blood Hawk
monsters.tactics: Attacks in flocks, uses Pack Tactics, targets eyes and wounds.

monsters.name: Blue Dragon Wyrmling
monsters.tactics: Uses breath weapon from distance, burrows to escape, arrogant but cautious.

monsters.name: Boar
monsters.tactics: Charges with tusks, uses Relentless to stay up, fights until dead.

monsters.name: Bone Devil
monsters.tactics: Uses sting to poison, casts invisibility to reposition, commands lesser devils.

monsters.name: Brown Bear
monsters.tactics: Multiattack with bite and claws, mauls prone targets, defends territory.

monsters.name: Bugbear
monsters.tactics: Surprise attacks for extra damage, uses reach with morningstar, bullies weaker foes.

monsters.name: Bulette
monsters.tactics: Burrows to ambush, uses Deadly Leap on groups, retreats underground to heal.

monsters.name: Camel
monsters.tactics: Bites in self-defense, used as mount, spits when annoyed.

monsters.name: Cat
monsters.tactics: Scratches and flees, uses stealth and keen senses.

monsters.name: Centaur
monsters.tactics: Charges with pike, uses hooves on prone enemies, fights to protect territory.

monsters.name: Chain Devil
monsters.tactics: Uses chains to grapple multiple targets, animates nearby chains, sadistic combatant.

monsters.name: Chimera
monsters.tactics: Opens with fire breath, uses multiattack with all three heads, erratic behavior.

monsters.name: Chuul
monsters.tactics: Grapples with pincers, uses paralyzing tentacles, drags prey underwater.

monsters.name: Clay Golem
monsters.tactics: Follows commands exactly, uses Haste when available, immune to most magic.

monsters.name: Cloaker
monsters.tactics: Disguises as cloak, attaches to victim, uses phantasms to confuse rescuers.

monsters.name: Cloud Giant
monsters.tactics: Throws rocks from above, uses morningstar in melee, casts fog cloud to escape.

monsters.name: Cockatrice
monsters.tactics: Pecks to petrify, attacks petrified victims, flees from groups.

monsters.name: Commoner
monsters.tactics: Flees from combat, cries for help, uses improvised weapons if cornered.

monsters.name: Constrictor Snake
monsters.tactics: Ambushes from concealment, constricts and squeezes, releases if badly hurt.

monsters.name: Couatl
monsters.tactics: Uses spells first, bites to poison, shapechanges to infiltrate or escape.

monsters.name: Crab
monsters.tactics: Pinches in self-defense, hides in shells or sand.

monsters.name: Crocodile
monsters.tactics: Ambushes from water, grapples and drags prey underwater, death rolls.

monsters.name: Cult Fanatic
monsters.tactics: Casts hold person on threats, uses spiritual weapon, leads cultists.

monsters.name: Cultist
monsters.tactics: Attacks in groups, follows fanatic's orders, fanatically loyal.

monsters.name: Darkmantle
monsters.tactics: Uses darkness aura, drops onto prey, crushes and constricts.

monsters.name: Death Dog
monsters.tactics: Uses two-headed advantage, disease-carrying bites, hunts in packs.

monsters.name: Deer
monsters.tactics: Flees immediately, only bucks fight and only when cornered.

monsters.name: Deva
monsters.tactics: Uses Healing Touch on allies, smites evil with mace, casts raise dead on fallen good creatures.

monsters.name: Dire Wolf
monsters.tactics: Uses Pack Tactics, knocks prone and savages, alpha leads pack.

monsters.name: Djinni
monsters.tactics: Creates whirlwind, uses scimitar with multiattack, grants wishes if bound.

monsters.name: Doppelganger
monsters.tactics: Reads minds, impersonates party members, attacks surprised targets.

monsters.name: Draft Horse
monsters.tactics: Hooves in self-defense, panics and flees from fire or loud noises.

monsters.name: Dragon Turtle
monsters.tactics: Uses steam breath on ships, capsizes vessels, demands tribute.

monsters.name: Dretch
monsters.tactics: Swarms enemies, uses Fetid Cloud when surrounded, cowardly but numerous.

monsters.name: Drider
monsters.tactics: Uses web and darkness, attacks from ceiling, uses longbow at range.

monsters.name: Drow
monsters.tactics: Uses darkness and faerie fire, poisoned crossbow bolts, fights dirty.

monsters.name: Druid
monsters.tactics: Wild shapes for combat or escape, uses entangle and thunderwave, protects nature.

monsters.name: Dryad
monsters.tactics: Uses charm on intruders, tree stride to escape, avoids direct combat.

monsters.name: Duergar
monsters.tactics: Enlarges for combat, uses invisibility to ambush, fights in formation.

monsters.name: Dust Mephit
monsters.tactics: Uses Blinding Breath, explodes on death, harasses and annoys.

monsters.name: Eagle
monsters.tactics: Dives and attacks, uses keen sight, flees when wounded.

monsters.name: Earth Elemental
monsters.tactics: Earth glides through stone, uses siege monster trait, slams repeatedly.

monsters.name: Efreeti
monsters.tactics: Uses Hurl Flame at range, scimitar in melee, arrogant and tyrannical.

monsters.name: Elephant
monsters.tactics: Tramples prone enemies, uses gore attack, protects herd.

monsters.name: Elk
monsters.tactics: Charges with ram attack, knocks prone, bulls defend herd.

monsters.name: Erinyes
monsters.tactics: Uses longbow with poison, flies to stay mobile, focuses on corrupting mortals.

monsters.name: Ettercap
monsters.tactics: Sets web traps, commands spiders, attacks webbed victims.

monsters.name: Ettin
monsters.tactics: Uses two-headed advantage, battleaxe and morningstar combo, argues with itself.

monsters.name: Fire Elemental
monsters.tactics: Ignites flammable objects, touches to set ablaze, vulnerable to water.

monsters.name: Fire Giant
monsters.tactics: Throws rocks or uses greatsword, commands troops militarily, fights with discipline.

monsters.name: Flesh Golem
monsters.tactics: Berserk when damaged, immune to most spells, follows creator's orders.

monsters.name: Flying Snake
monsters.tactics: Flyby attacks, venomous bite, guards temples.

monsters.name: Flying Sword
monsters.tactics: Follows simple commands, slashes at nearest enemy, fights until destroyed.

monsters.name: Frog
monsters.tactics: Hops away from danger, used as familiar.

monsters.name: Frost Giant
monsters.tactics: Throws rocks, uses greataxe, raids and pillages, respects strength.

monsters.name: Gargoyle
monsters.tactics: Disguises as statue, ambushes, uses flight and multiattack.

monsters.name: Gelatinous Cube
monsters.tactics: Slowly advances, engulfs creatures, mindlessly consumes.

monsters.name: Ghast
monsters.tactics: Uses stench to sicken, paralyzes with claws, leads ghouls.

monsters.name: Ghost
monsters.tactics: Uses Horrifying Visage, possesses the strongest PC, phases through walls.

monsters.name: Ghoul
monsters.tactics: Paralyzes with claws, feeds on paralyzed victims, hunts in packs.

monsters.name: Giant Ape
monsters.tactics: Throws rocks, uses multiattack with fists, territorial and aggressive.

monsters.name: Giant Badger
monsters.tactics: Burrows to ambush, multiattack with bite and claws, fierce defender.

monsters.name: Giant Bat
monsters.tactics: Swoops and bites, uses echolocation, flees from fire.

monsters.name: Giant Boar
monsters.tactics: Charges with tusks, uses Relentless, fights until dead.

monsters.name: Giant Centipede
monsters.tactics: Bites with poison, climbs walls, swarms prey.

monsters.name: Giant Constrictor Snake
monsters.tactics: Constricts and squeezes, drowns prey in water, ambushes from concealment.

monsters.name: Giant Crab
monsters.tactics: Grapples with claws, drags prey underwater, guards territory.

monsters.name: Giant Crocodile
monsters.tactics: Ambushes from water, grapples with bite, drowns prey.

monsters.name: Giant Eagle
monsters.tactics: Dives with talons, carries off small prey, intelligent enough to ally.

monsters.name: Giant Elk
monsters.tactics: Charges with ram, tramples prone enemies, noble creature.

monsters.name: Giant Fire Beetle
monsters.tactics: Bites in self-defense, glowing glands useful as light source.

monsters.name: Giant Frog
monsters.tactics: Swallows Small creatures, uses tongue to grapple, ambushes from water.

monsters.name: Giant Goat
monsters.tactics: Charges with ram, Sure-Footed on cliffs, defends herd.

monsters.name: Giant Hyena
monsters.tactics: Uses Rampage to chain kills, hunts in packs, targets wounded prey.

monsters.name: Giant Lizard
monsters.tactics: Bites and holds, used as mount by kobolds, climbs walls.

monsters.name: Giant Octopus
monsters.tactics: Grapples with tentacles, uses ink cloud to escape, drowns air-breathers.

monsters.name: Giant Owl
monsters.tactics: Flyby attacks with talons, silent flight, intelligent enough to scout.

monsters.name: Giant Poisonous Snake
monsters.tactics: Strikes with poisonous bite, ambushes from hiding, flees when hurt.

monsters.name: Giant Rat
monsters.tactics: Uses Pack Tactics, swarms in numbers, spreads disease.

monsters.name: Giant Scorpion
monsters.tactics: Grapples with claws, stings for poison, ambushes from sand.

monsters.name: Giant Sea Horse
monsters.tactics: Charges with ram, used as aquatic mount, flees from predators.

monsters.name: Giant Shark
monsters.tactics: Blood Frenzy advantage, bites and tears, relentless hunter.

monsters.name: Giant Spider
monsters.tactics: Web restrains prey, venomous bite, spider climb for ambush.

monsters.name: Giant Toad
monsters.tactics: Swallows Medium creatures, uses standing leap to close distance.

monsters.name: Giant Vulture
monsters.tactics: Uses Pack Tactics, circles and waits for weakness, multiattack.

monsters.name: Giant Wasp
monsters.tactics: Stings for poison, guards hive aggressively, swarms intruders.

monsters.name: Giant Weasel
monsters.tactics: Uses keen hearing and smell, bites and holds, drains blood.

monsters.name: Giant Wolf Spider
monsters.tactics: Ambushes from walls, venomous bite, wraps prey in webbing.

monsters.name: Gibbering Mouther
monsters.tactics: Gibbering confuses nearby, blinding spittle, absorbs fallen enemies.

monsters.name: Glabrezu
monsters.tactics: Uses power word stun, grapples with pincers, tempts mortals with wishes.

monsters.name: Gladiator
monsters.tactics: Uses shield bash to knock prone, multiattack with spear, Brave against fear.

monsters.name: Gnoll
monsters.tactics: Uses Rampage to chain attacks, hunts in packs, savage and hungry.

monsters.name: Goat
monsters.tactics: Rams and flees, Sure-Footed on terrain.

monsters.name: Goblin
monsters.tactics: Uses Nimble Escape, hit-and-run attacks, sets ambushes and traps.

monsters.name: Gorgon
monsters.tactics: Charges with Trampling Charge, uses petrifying breath, relentless.

monsters.name: Gray Ooze
monsters.tactics: Ambushes disguised as stone, corrodes metal armor and weapons.

monsters.name: Green Dragon Wyrmling
monsters.tactics: Uses poison breath from concealment, manipulative even when young.

monsters.name: Green Hag
monsters.tactics: Uses Illusory Appearance to trick, invisible to target, claws if cornered.

monsters.name: Grick
monsters.tactics: Ambushes from rocky areas, uses tentacles then beak, Stone Camouflage.

monsters.name: Griffon
monsters.tactics: Dives from above, multiattack with beak and claws, defends nest fiercely.

monsters.name: Grimlock
monsters.tactics: Uses blind senses, stone camouflage for ambush, fights in darkness.

monsters.name: Guard
monsters.tactics: Calls for backup, uses spear at range, fights in groups.

monsters.name: Guardian Naga
monsters.tactics: Casts flame strike and hold person, uses poison spit, guards sacred places.

monsters.name: Gynosphinx
monsters.tactics: Tests with riddles, uses legend lore for information, claw attacks if provoked.

monsters.name: Half-Red Dragon Veteran
monsters.tactics: Opens with fire breath, uses multiattack, leads other troops.

monsters.name: Harpy
monsters.tactics: Uses Luring Song to charm, attacks charmed targets, fights dirty.

monsters.name: Hawk
monsters.tactics: Dives and pecks, uses keen sight, flees when threatened.

monsters.name: Hell Hound
monsters.tactics: Uses fire breath on groups, Pack Tactics with other hell hounds, relentless pursuit.

monsters.name: Hezrou
monsters.tactics: Uses Stench aura, grapples and bites, brutal melee combatant.

monsters.name: Hill Giant
monsters.tactics: Throws rocks, uses greatclub, stupid but strong, easily distracted by food.

monsters.name: Hippogriff
monsters.tactics: Dives with talons, beak attacks, can be trained as mount.

monsters.name: Hobgoblin
monsters.tactics: Uses Martial Advantage with allies, fights in organized formations, disciplined.

monsters.name: Homunculus
monsters.tactics: Delivers touch spells for master, bite puts targets to sleep, telepathic link.

monsters.name: Horned Devil
monsters.tactics: Uses Hurl Flame at range, multiattack with fork and tail, relentless.

monsters.name: Hunter Shark
monsters.tactics: Blood Frenzy gives advantage, bites and circles, hunts in packs.

monsters.name: Hydra
monsters.tactics: Multiple bite attacks, regrows heads, focus fire one head prevents growth.

monsters.name: Hyena
monsters.tactics: Pack Tactics with others, cowardly alone, scavenges.

monsters.name: Ice Devil
monsters.tactics: Uses Wall of Ice tactically, cold aura damages nearby, spear multiattack.

monsters.name: Ice Mephit
monsters.tactics: Uses Frost Breath, explodes on death, harasses from flight.

monsters.name: Imp
monsters.tactics: Turns invisible, uses sting poison, serves as familiar, cowardly.

monsters.name: Invisible Stalker
monsters.tactics: Permanent invisibility, stalks assigned target relentlessly, slams repeatedly.

monsters.name: Iron Golem
monsters.tactics: Uses Poison Breath, sword attacks, immune to most magic, follows orders.

monsters.name: Jackal
monsters.tactics: Pack Tactics, cowardly scavenger, flees from threats.

monsters.name: Killer Whale
monsters.tactics: Echolocation to find prey, bites and thrashes, hunts in pods.

monsters.name: Knight
monsters.tactics: Uses Leadership, multiattack with greatsword, Brave against fear, mounted combat.

monsters.name: Kobold
monsters.tactics: Uses Pack Tactics religiously, Sunlight Sensitivity weakness, sets traps.

monsters.name: Kraken
monsters.tactics: Legendary actions every turn, grapples multiple targets, Lightning Storm devastates ships.

monsters.name: Lamia
monsters.tactics: Uses Intoxicating Touch to charm, casts major image for deception, seductive predator.

monsters.name: Lemure
monsters.tactics: Swarms enemies mindlessly, regenerates unless killed with good/silver, fodder.

monsters.name: Lich
monsters.tactics: Opens with Power Word Kill, uses legendary actions for cantrips, protects phylactery.

monsters.name: Lion
monsters.tactics: Pounces to knock prone, Pack Tactics with pride, Running Leap to close.

monsters.name: Lizard
monsters.tactics: Bites in self-defense, flees immediately.

monsters.name: Lizardfolk
monsters.tactics: Uses multiattack, shields provide AC, fights to eat victims.

monsters.name: Mage
monsters.tactics: Opens with cone of cold or fireball, uses shield and misty step defensively.

monsters.name: Magma Mephit
monsters.tactics: Uses Fire Breath, explodes on death, harasses from flight.

monsters.name: Magmin
monsters.tactics: Touch ignites flammables, Death Burst on death, swarms enemies.

monsters.name: Mammoth
monsters.tactics: Trampling Charge prone, gore attack, protects herd.

monsters.name: Manticore
monsters.tactics: Uses tail spikes at range, multiattack in melee, cruel hunter.

monsters.name: Marilith
monsters.tactics: Six sword multiattack, uses tail to grapple casters, teleports to reposition.

monsters.name: Mastiff
monsters.tactics: Knocks prone with bite, guards master, keen hearing and smell.

monsters.name: Medusa
monsters.tactics: Uses Petrifying Gaze, snake hair for close range, longbow at distance.

monsters.name: Merfolk
monsters.tactics: Uses spear, amphibious mobility, fights in groups.

monsters.name: Merrow
monsters.tactics: Harpoons to drag prey, claws and bites, drowns air-breathers.

monsters.name: Mimic
monsters.tactics: Disguises as treasure chest, adhesive grapples, pseudopod attacks.

monsters.name: Minotaur
monsters.tactics: Charges to gore, uses Labyrinthine Recall, relentless pursuit in maze.

monsters.name: Minotaur Skeleton
monsters.tactics: Charges to gore, mindless combatant, follows creator's commands.

monsters.name: Mule
monsters.tactics: Kicks in self-defense, Sure-Footed on terrain, beast of burden.

monsters.name: Mummy
monsters.tactics: Uses Dreadful Glare to frighten, rotting fist curse, guards tombs.

monsters.name: Mummy Lord
monsters.tactics: Casts insect plague and harm, uses legendary actions, heart must be destroyed.

monsters.name: Nalfeshnee
monsters.tactics: Uses Horror Nimbus, multiattack with claws and bite, judges and torments.

monsters.name: Night Hag
monsters.tactics: Haunts dreams to kill, uses heartstone to become ethereal, trades soul larvae.

monsters.name: Nightmare
monsters.tactics: Ethereal stride to escape, flaming hooves, serves evil riders.

monsters.name: Noble
monsters.tactics: Commands guards, uses rapier if cornered, flees or negotiates.

monsters.name: Ochre Jelly
monsters.tactics: Splits when hit with slashing/lightning, dissolves organics, mindless.

monsters.name: Octopus
monsters.tactics: Grapples with tentacles, ink cloud to escape.

monsters.name: Ogre
monsters.tactics: Throws javelins, uses greatclub, stupid and greedy.

monsters.name: Ogre Zombie
monsters.tactics: Uses Undead Fortitude to stay up, morningstar attacks, mindless.

monsters.name: Oni
monsters.tactics: Shapechanges to infiltrate, uses cone of cold, regenerates.

monsters.name: Orc
monsters.tactics: Uses Aggressive to close distance, greataxe attacks, savage and violent.

monsters.name: Otyugh
monsters.tactics: Grapples with tentacles, bites for disease, ambushes from refuse.

monsters.name: Owl
monsters.tactics: Flyby attack, silent flight, used as familiar.

monsters.name: Owlbear
monsters.tactics: Multiattack with beak and claws, savage and territorial, guards nest.

monsters.name: Panther
monsters.tactics: Pounces to knock prone, uses stealth to ambush.

monsters.name: Pegasus
monsters.tactics: Flies to stay mobile, hooves attack, serves good riders.

monsters.name: Phase Spider
monsters.tactics: Phases from Ethereal to attack, venomous bite, phases out to escape.

monsters.name: Pit Fiend
monsters.tactics: Uses Fear Aura, multiattack with all weapons, commands devils.

monsters.name: Planetar
monsters.tactics: Uses divine awareness, greatsword with radiant damage, heals allies.

monsters.name: Plesiosaurus
monsters.tactics: Bites from long neck, drags prey underwater, holds breath.

monsters.name: Poisonous Snake
monsters.tactics: Strikes with poison, flees if threatened.

monsters.name: Polar Bear
monsters.tactics: Multiattack with bite and claws, keen smell, powerful swimmer.

monsters.name: Pony
monsters.tactics: Hooves in self-defense, used as mount for small creatures.

monsters.name: Priest
monsters.tactics: Casts spirit guardians, uses healing, leads religious services.

monsters.name: Pseudodragon
monsters.tactics: Stings to put enemies to sleep, telepathic bond with master, timid.

monsters.name: Purple Worm
monsters.tactics: Swallows creatures whole, tail stinger poison, tunnels through rock.

monsters.name: Quasit
monsters.tactics: Turns invisible, uses Scare, shapeshifts to escape, serves as familiar.

monsters.name: Quipper
monsters.tactics: Blood Frenzy in swarms, bites in feeding frenzy.

monsters.name: Rakshasa
monsters.tactics: Disguises self, uses charm person, immune to low-level spells, manipulator.

monsters.name: Rat
monsters.tactics: Swarms in numbers, spreads disease, flees alone.

monsters.name: Raven
monsters.tactics: Mimics sounds, used as familiar, flees from combat.

monsters.name: Red Dragon Wyrmling
monsters.tactics: Uses fire breath, arrogant, collects treasure even when young.

monsters.name: Reef Shark
monsters.tactics: Pack Tactics with other sharks, bites wounded prey.

monsters.name: Remorhaz
monsters.tactics: Heated body burns attackers, swallows prey, tunnels through ice.

monsters.name: Rhinoceros
monsters.tactics: Charges with gore, prone targets get trampled, territorial.

monsters.name: Riding Horse
monsters.tactics: Hooves in self-defense, standard mount.

monsters.name: Roc
monsters.tactics: Dives to grapple, carries prey to nest, massive and territorial.

monsters.name: Roper
monsters.tactics: False Appearance as stalagmite, tendrils grapple and reel in, bites grappled prey.

monsters.name: Rug of Smothering
monsters.tactics: Antimagic Susceptibility, grapples and smothers, appears as normal rug.

monsters.name: Rust Monster
monsters.tactics: Rusts metal equipment on touch, targets armored foes, not aggressive.

monsters.name: Saber-Toothed Tiger
monsters.tactics: Pounces to knock prone, savage bite, pack hunter.

monsters.name: Sahuagin
monsters.tactics: Blood Frenzy advantage, multiattack, fights in groups.

monsters.name: Salamander
monsters.tactics: Heated body burns grapplers, spear and tail attacks, forces slaves to serve.

monsters.name: Satyr
monsters.tactics: Uses ram charge, plays pipes for magic, avoids serious combat.

monsters.name: Scorpion
monsters.tactics: Stings in self-defense, hides under rocks.

monsters.name: Scout
monsters.tactics: Uses longbow from range, multiattack, flees to report.

monsters.name: Sea Hag
monsters.tactics: Uses Horrific Appearance to frighten, Death Glare kills frightened targets.

monsters.name: Sea Horse
monsters.tactics: Flees from danger, no combat ability.

monsters.name: Shadow
monsters.tactics: Strength Drain creates new shadows, hides in darkness, vulnerable to radiant.

monsters.name: Shambling Mound
monsters.tactics: Engulfs and suffocates, absorbs lightning, relentless pursuit.

monsters.name: Shield Guardian
monsters.tactics: Guards master, stores spells, shield reaction protects master.

monsters.name: Shrieker
monsters.tactics: Shrieks to alert other creatures, no attacks, dies easily.

monsters.name: Silver Dragon Wyrmling
monsters.tactics: Uses cold breath, friendly to humanoids, curious about mortals.

monsters.name: Skeleton
monsters.tactics: Uses shortbow or sword, follows commands, mindless.

monsters.name: Solar
monsters.tactics: Uses Slaying Longbow, legendary resistance, Flying Sword attacks, heals allies.

monsters.name: Specter
monsters.tactics: Life Drain creates more specters, incorporeal movement, sunlight sensitivity.

monsters.name: Spider
monsters.tactics: Web Sense detects prey, bites in self-defense.

monsters.name: Spirit Naga
monsters.tactics: Casts lightning bolt, uses charm person, bite with poison.

monsters.name: Sprite
monsters.tactics: Uses Heart Sight, invisible, poison arrows to sleep.

monsters.name: Spy
monsters.tactics: Sneak Attack from hiding, uses Cunning Action, gathers information.

monsters.name: Steam Mephit
monsters.tactics: Uses Steam Breath, explodes on death, harasses from flight.

monsters.name: Stirge
monsters.tactics: Attaches and drains blood, swarms prey, detaches when full.

monsters.name: Stone Giant
monsters.tactics: Throws rocks from range, greatclub in melee, catches rocks thrown at it.

monsters.name: Stone Golem
monsters.tactics: Uses Slow when active, multiattack with slam, immune to most magic.

monsters.name: Storm Giant
monsters.tactics: Uses Lightning Strike, greatsword multiattack, controls weather.

monsters.name: Succubus/Incubus
monsters.tactics: Charms with Etherealness escape, draining kiss, corrupts mortals.

monsters.name: Swarm of Bats
monsters.tactics: Swarm resistance, bites in mass, flees from bright light.

monsters.name: Swarm of Insects
monsters.tactics: Swarm resistance, bites in mass, hard to kill conventionally.

monsters.name: Swarm of Poisonous Snakes
monsters.tactics: Swarm resistance, multiple poisonous bites.

monsters.name: Swarm of Quippers
monsters.tactics: Blood Frenzy, swarm resistance, feeding frenzy.

monsters.name: Swarm of Rats
monsters.tactics: Swarm resistance, spreads disease, overwhelms with numbers.

monsters.name: Swarm of Ravens
monsters.tactics: Swarm resistance, pecks and claws, flees when damaged.

monsters.name: Tarrasque
monsters.tactics: Unstoppable destruction, legendary actions every turn, reflects magic, devours everything.

monsters.name: Thug
monsters.tactics: Uses Pack Tactics, multiattack with mace, intimidates victims.

monsters.name: Tiger
monsters.tactics: Pounces to knock prone, stealth ambush, solitary hunter.

monsters.name: Treant
monsters.tactics: Animates trees, slam attacks, throws rocks, guards ancient forests.

monsters.name: Tribal Warrior
monsters.tactics: Uses Pack Tactics, spear attacks, defends tribe.

monsters.name: Triceratops
monsters.tactics: Trampling Charge prone, gore with horns, defends herd.

monsters.name: Troll
monsters.tactics: Regenerates constantly, multiattack with claws and bite, fire/acid stops regen.

monsters.name: Tyrannosaurus Rex
monsters.tactics: Multiattack with bite and tail, bite grapples, apex predator.

monsters.name: Unicorn
monsters.tactics: Uses Healing Touch, legendary actions to teleport, protects forest.

monsters.name: Vampire
monsters.tactics: Charms targets, uses legendary actions, regenerates, summons minions.

monsters.name: Vampire Spawn
monsters.tactics: Claws and bite, regenerates, serves master vampire.

monsters.name: Veteran
monsters.tactics: Uses multiattack, longsword and shortsword combo, experienced fighter.

monsters.name: Violet Fungus
monsters.tactics: Rotting Touch necrotic damage, disguises among normal fungi.

monsters.name: Vrock
monsters.tactics: Uses Stunning Screech, multiattack with beak and talons, spores sicken.

monsters.name: Vulture
monsters.tactics: Pack Tactics, scavenges corpses, cowardly.

monsters.name: Warhorse
monsters.tactics: Trampling Charge prone, trained for war, serves rider.

monsters.name: Warhorse Skeleton
monsters.tactics: Hooves attack, undead mount, follows commands.

monsters.name: Water Elemental
monsters.tactics: Whelm engulfs targets, slam attacks, controls water.

monsters.name: Weasel
monsters.tactics: Keen hearing and smell, flees from threats.

monsters.name: Werebear
monsters.tactics: Hybrid form for multiattack, curse spreads lycanthropy, good-aligned.

monsters.name: Wereboar
monsters.tactics: Charges in boar form, multiattack in hybrid, relentless.

monsters.name: Wererat
monsters.tactics: Hand crossbow at range, bite spreads lycanthropy, sneaky.

monsters.name: Weretiger
monsters.tactics: Pounces in cat form, multiattack in hybrid, solitary.

monsters.name: Werewolf
monsters.tactics: Multiattack with claws and bite, spreads lycanthropy, pack hunter.

monsters.name: White Dragon Wyrmling
monsters.tactics: Uses cold breath, savage and bestial, hoards treasure.

monsters.name: Wight
monsters.tactics: Life Drain creates zombies, uses longsword, commands lesser undead.

monsters.name: Will-o'-Wisp
monsters.tactics: Lures prey with light, Shock on unconscious targets, Consume Life ability.

monsters.name: Winter Wolf
monsters.tactics: Uses Cold Breath on groups, Pack Tactics, intelligent hunter.

monsters.name: Wolf
monsters.tactics: Pack Tactics for advantage, prone with bite, hunts in packs.

monsters.name: Worg
monsters.tactics: Used as goblin mount, bites and knocks prone, evil and intelligent.

monsters.name: Wraith
monsters.tactics: Life Drain creates specters, incorporeal, sunlight sensitivity.

monsters.name: Wyvern
monsters.tactics: Multiattack with bite, claws, and stinger, poisonous sting, aggressive.

monsters.name: Xorn
monsters.tactics: Earth Glide ambush, multiattack with claws and bite, demands gems.

monsters.name: Young Black Dragon
monsters.tactics: Uses acid breath, ambushes from murky water, cruel and cunning.

monsters.name: Young Blue Dragon
monsters.tactics: Uses lightning breath in lines, burrows to ambush, vain and territorial.

monsters.name: Young Green Dragon
monsters.tactics: Uses poison breath, manipulates before fighting, cunning schemer.

monsters.name: Young Red Dragon
monsters.tactics: Uses fire breath, arrogant and aggressive, hoards treasure.

monsters.name: Young White Dragon
monsters.tactics: Uses cold breath, savage and bestial, dim but vicious.

monsters.name: Zombie
monsters.tactics: Undead Fortitude keeps it up, mindless attacker, slow but relentless.
